review: this movie's imdb rating should be more then 7. no wonder this movie is ahead of it's time. hatss off to anupam kher for making such a wonderful movie. this movie comprises of emotions, love and strong family bonding relationship in india.

great movie. great story. great actors. great acting. salute all.
